item.title: Market Simulation Model thoughts
item.description: I created the market simulation model because I needed a fast and painless way to obtain reasonable market values as an input into my big financial model. The big financial model attempts to predict actual BMO P&L (e.g.Â revenues) and takes as an input various drivers, including the equity markets. The more accurate the input variables, the more meaningful the model predictions are. How it works The idea behind the model is that while equity market prices do not appear to have any appreciable boundaries, market returns do.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
